about_the_game:
PROFANE – Do You Dare Challenge the Unknown?

You are a skeptic investigator, determined to debunk urban legends and paranormal cases. But what if some of these stories are true?

Profane is a psychological horror game with multiple chapters, each leading you to cursed places long abandoned. Your goal is to prove it’s all just superstition, but as the events unfold, you realize you might have gone too far.

With intense jumpscares, disturbing mysteries, and shocking plot twists, Profane challenges your sanity as you explore haunted locations and try to escape with your life.

FEATURES:

👁️ Psychological horror at its finest – The tension rises with every case.
👻 Unpredictable jumpscares – Never trust the silence.
🔎 Paranormal cases based on legends – Each chapter brings a new mystery.
🕵️ Investigate and uncover the truth – But be prepared for what you find.
🩸 A story full of twists – Not everything is as it seems.

Prepare to question your own disbelief… and regret stepping inside.

name: Profane

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Does not Support VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Does not Support VR

short_description: A psychological horror game where you investigate paranormal cases to debunk legends… until you realize some of them are real. Each location holds dark secrets, and leaving may not be as easy as entering.
